notes.text: This advisory aggregates security fixes for the postgresql SRPM in CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 8.6. It addresses 11 CVEs: CVE-2023-2454, CVE-2023-2455, CVE-2022-41862, CVE-2023-39417, CVE-2023-5868, and 6 more.
notes.title: Description

document.title: postgresql security update for CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 8.6
